sources.title: "Janice Meredith" (1924)

metadata.Plot: It is 1774, the eve of the American War of Independence. Janice comes from a Tory household. She cavorts with American and British alike, is pursued by Charles Fownes, patriot and friend of General Washington. Fields is a comic, drunken British sergeant.
metadata.Actors: Marion Davies, Holbrook Blinn, Harrison Ford
